output.sentences: Looks like a poster for something has been put up with a right turn.
Could this be the mad scientist lab or a mechanic's shop?
A poster has been made on how to install a brake.
My friend is following the instructions and trying to install the caliper brake.
The man in the tshirt is hoping he has done it right.
